video.title: Well-Intended Love
video.synopsis: To secure a bone marrow donation, an actress diagnosed with leukemia makes a marriage pact with a young CEO -- but love and secrets get in the way.

episodes.synopsis: D-list actress Xia Lin encounters dashing CEO Ling Yizhou, who turns out to possess something she desperately needs.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin appears with Yizhou at a jewelry show and encounters her ex, Zhao Jiayan, whose attempt to humiliate her backfires.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Now living under one roof with Xia Lin, Yizhou tells Chu Yan and An Ran about his marriage, but Xia Lin wishes to keep it under wraps.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Yizhou drives Xia Lin to work and encounters actress Yin Shuangshuang, who enlists Xia Lin's help in approaching Yizhou about a joint press conference.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Yizhou's new social media account explodes with followers. An Ran finds a new accomplice in her efforts to sabotage Yizhou and Xia Lin's marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin accepts a new role and meets the dog's mysterious owner, Nan Jintian. An Ran sets another trap for Xia Lin.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: After an accident, Yizhou begins to distance himself from Xia Lin. Rumors about Chu Yan and Xia Lin spread online.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: As her efforts to win back Yizhou's heart come to naught, Xia Lin seeks solace at Jintian's place and tells him about her marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Yizhou becomes suspicious of the tea An Ran serves him. Chu Yan's dad humiliates Xia Lin, putting his business ties with Yizhou at risk.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Yizhou and Xia Lin's relationship becomes public, Jintian sets his scheme in motion and Xia Lin discovers an unpleasant truth.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: After hearing Yizhou's emotional confession, Xia Lin tries to strike out on her own with a new job and moves back into her old apartment.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin's interview for a commercial role unravels, Yizhou makes a deal with Chu Yan's dad, and Jintian discusses a new scheme with An Ran.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: When a piece of evidence implicates Xia Lin in a crime, Yizhou suspects intrigue and confronts someone close to her.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Yizhou helps expose An Ran's scheme, which causes a media firestorm. Xia Lin accepts a new role and encounters a mysterious woman at a clothing store.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Jia Fei asks Xia Lin to co-star with Chu Yan in her movie about unrequited love. Xia Lin tries helping Yizhou to reconcile with his estranged mom.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin learns about Yizhou's and Jintian's troubled, intertwined pasts and confronts unexpected, potentially life-changing news.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Jintian shows Xia Lin his true colors as Yizhou races against time to locate her, but An Ran is the only one who can help him trace the culprit.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: After her attempts to escape come to naught, Xia Lin outwits Jintian and sends a signal to Yizhou -- but Jintian is one step ahead.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: As Yizhou's fate hangs by a thread, Xia Lin and Chu Yan must prevent someone close to him from taking control of Lingshi Group.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Yizhou tells his mom that he chooses not to retaliate against Jintian. Xia Lin faces an unforeseeable threat.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Actress Xia Lin crosses paths with wealthy business man Ling Yizhou, and their interaction is caught by paparazzi and sparks lots of negative talks。
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin confronts Ling Yizhou on his shocking announcement, who explains the best way to shake off a scandal is turning it into a positive story.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: As a couple, Xia Lin and Ling Yizhou arrive at a villa to participate in a reality show, where a puppy creates an unexpected complication.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: On her first day shooting for a new show, Xia Lin is pushed into the water out of bad intention, but luckily is saved by co-star Chu Yan.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jia Fei advises Xia Lin on moving in with Lin Yizhou, whose romantic gestures start to make Xia Lin feels real about their relationship.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin and Ling Yizhou clear some misunderstanding; Xia Lin gets drunk and ponders on her feelings; Fu Weining schemes against Ling Yizhou.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Ling Yizhou and Xia Lin start a different kind of living together. Chu Yan has a heart-to-heart with his father, then opens up to Ling Yizhou.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin makes a bold move, then goes with Ling Yizhou to see his grandma. Facing challenges in his company, Chu Yan receives unexpected help.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Chu Yan sabotages the blind date his father sets for him. Ling Yizhou suprises Xia Lin with a grand gesture, leaving vengeful Jiang Yushi furious.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin and Ling Yizhou's attention are brought to Yao Liang's accident. Astonished by Ling Yizhou's secret, Xia Lin loses trust in him.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Jiang Yushi makes a big announcement with Xia Lin's social media account. With Jia Fei's advice, Xia Lin tries to make amends with Ling Yizhou.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: With Ling Yizhou still acting aloof, Xia Lin turns to his grandma for advice, and learns about the shadow from his past.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin and Ling Yizhou open up to each other and make up. Jiang Yushi's schemes backfire, then she realises Ling Yizhou is not the one to blame.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Ling Yizhou confronts Fu Weining, where Xia Lin is hit on the head and loses her memory. Chu Yan and Ruan Meng share an elevator incident.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Xia Lin pieces together the past two years and demands to break the contract with Ling Yizhou, who agrees but asks her to visit three places with him.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: One place after another, Xia Lin's memory starts to come back. On her sweet wedding day, two other couples also embark their happily ever after.
episodes.title: Episode 16
